description:
Doors open at 18:30 - Talks starts at 19:00

Thank you to JustEat for hosting us and providing 🍕 & 🍺 

--

Introduction to Three.js - 3D Modelling in Javascript 

A run through of the basics of Three.js and how to create a rigged hand model in JSON

WebGL/WebVR - Mark Lundin & Edan Kwan

We will be talking about creative coding using WebGL and an introduction to WebVR. Here are some of the work we will be talking:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Apn8lhEwDrA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8h2FgFkcpIw

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CzaVRXapnW0

title: WebGL/WebVR - Mark Lundin & Edan Kwan / Intro to Three.js - Mairead Buchan
